WorkItem.Description:
Hello,

Has anybody encounterd code 800B0109 (Win 7 SP1) when installing Flash update 11.0.7.224 with automatic updates?

I followed the steps in the manual and as test i configured a laptop and a desktop for WSUS. On the desktop all the updates including Flash were succesfull and on the laptop it keeps failing.

I triple checked the settings of the laptop and desktop and i can't find an anything wrong with the settings.

Anybody some advice?
WorkItem.Summary: Code 800B0109 (Win 7 SP1) when installing Flash update 11.0.7.224 with automatic updates

Comments.Message: HI rayman160, this code mean there is a problem with the file signature. Please check on your laptop that the certificate have been correctly imported in the right certificate store and reboot the computer.
Do you still have the problem ?

Sorry for the slow reply, i was off for a couple of days.
I'm pretty sure that i imported the certificate correctly. I had no problems on other computers that i configured manually. 
The problem seems to be solved at the moment. I disabled updating from wsus, did a reboot, did a check for updates, enabled updating from wsus, did a reboot, check for updates and then the Flash update succeeded. The first time i did these steps the update still gave an error but the second time it worked.

Thanks for your time and your help!
